sim

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • sim.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Field
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class of field that changes its colour depending on neighbours or at random. To Start chaning it needs to be executed at fixed rate, best at getSpeed() speed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Field

        public Field(java.util.Random rand,
             double colour_change_chance,
             int speed,
             java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock super_lock)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        rand - RNG. [must not be null pointer]
        colour_change_chance - chance of field changing its colour randomly. [must be positive]
        speed - Speed of changing colour. [must be within [0,1] range]
        super_lock - Super lock when all fields properties are being changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given arguments are not correct.
